nodes.text: The Temple of Fire was a Massassi temple on Yavin 4 used for blood sacrifices.

When Exar Kun arrived on the moon, he was captured by the Massassi and led to that temple to be executed. However, using the dark power of the Sith amulets, he defeated the monster that Naga Sadow had created and was worshiped as a god by the Massassi.
